channel.title: Fun on null
channel.description: Recent content in Fun on null

item.title: Playing Tools &
item.description: Tweaking i3-wm on Manjaro, and Pop!OS. Lost my i3 config for logging out and shutdown. Earlier, I reinstalled Catalina on the old Macbook. I also had a Mac Mini in the suitcase, no 4k monitor here, so not turning it on recently. Besides, I play with phones, Nothing Phone 1 and the old iPhone 11. And kindle, and kindle fire tablet which I bought on Amazon on the last Prime Day.

item.title: Shapez
item.description: 最近迷上了这款小游戏，玩得不亦乐乎。 虽然通关了，但是一直没做出来自动制造机。 Shapez 2 is coming! 2023-09-02
